subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Tigers trailed by as many as 24 points in the second half and only got as close as 6 twice in the game’s final 2 minutes 15 seconds.
snippet: The Tigers trailed by as many as 24 points in the second half and only got as close as 6 twice in the game’s final 2 minutes 15 seconds.
